snippet.title: Harrow 1.2 Release - Silent Hill Inspired Nightmare Game - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Get it here: https://dreammix.itch.io/harrow

Harrow is ON SALE for $1.99 until 12:00AM Sunday (basically exactly tomorrow). Harrow is a culmination of several nightmares. All of these nightmares were in an old 1995-1998 horror video game setting. It's also heavily inspired by the Silent Hill series, as that has been an influence for many of my nightmares. That's why the game is themed the way that it is. By entering this game, you are entering the embodiment of the nightmares, and because of this, you should proceed with caution.

I got some complaints about the darkness being too extreme, so I reduced that and made some other changes to compensate. Here's some gameplay.

Changes for this version:
-------------------------------
-Darkness reduced overall.
-Time before running cool down is lengthened.
-Creatures have larger areas to chase you from. They can now chase you before you hear them.
-Some creatures have been sped up to compensate for the large range and reduced darkness.
